metadata.title: CVE-2023-52461 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/sched: Fix bounds limiting when given a malformed entityIf we're given a malformed entity in drm_sched_entity_init()--shouldn'thappen, but we verify--with out-of-bounds priority value, we set it to anallowed value. Fix the expression which sets this limit.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
